title: Yellow Airlines 350th plane livery
content:
Yellow Airlines 350th plane livery
黃色航空A350-900第350架飛機塗裝在圖盧茲機場滑行為了慶祝黃色航空第350架飛機，第350架飛機：空中客車A350-900使用了其獨特的塗裝設計。該飛機現已組裝和噴塗完成，已於3月16日早晨平安抵達太平川國際機場。待客艙準備工作完成，預計3月20日會投入服務。該飛機定員285人，其中頭等艙10人，商務艙30人，經濟艙232人，機組13人。頭等艙使用水憶座艙，帶給乘客最舒適的旅途。
黄色航空 A350-900 第 350 架飞机涂装在图卢兹机场滑行为了庆祝黄色航空第 350 架飞机，第 350 架飞机：空中客车 A350-900 使用了其独特的涂装设计。该飞机现已组装和喷涂完成，已于 3 月 16 日早晨平安抵达太平川国际机场。待客舱准备工作完成，预计 3 月 20 日会投入服务。该飞机定员 285 人，其中头等舱 10 人，商务舱 30 人，经济舱 232 人，机组 13 人。头等舱使用水忆座舱，带给乘客最舒适的旅途。
Yellow Airlines 350th plane A350-900 was taxing with Special Livery at Toulouse Airport
To celebrate Yellow Airlines’ 350th aircraft, the new plane from Airbus A350-900 has been given a unique livery design. The aircraft has completed assembly and painting and safely arrived at Tai Peng Cheun International Airport on the morning of March 16. Once cabin preparations are complete, it is expected to enter service on March 20. The aircraft has a seating capacity of 285 passengers, including 10 in first class, 30 in business class, and 232 in economy class, with a crew of 13. The first-class cabin features the Shui Yik Suite, offering passengers the utmost comfort during their journey.

title: Annual Report 2024| 2024年年度总结
content:
黃色航空全年淨利潤較2023年增加1.4億美元，達到5.76億美元，全年營業利潤達到16.98億美元。黃色航空2024年乘客人數超越2018年最高峰，達到1.9億人次以上2025展望：有望超越2022年最強勁收入年度
黃色集團黃色航空公司執行董事長與首席執行官Khensol Hill: 
“尊敬的旅客、合作夥伴與全體員工：
過去一年，我們黃色航空憑藉卓越的經營策略、優質的客戶服務與強勁的市場需求，取得了歷史性佳績。我們在全球航空業恢復與增長的背景下，穩步推進業務發展，並交出了一份亮眼的成績單。
2024年對黃色公司來說，極具挑戰性。首先，在上半年，我們的贊助商突然與我們終止了合作，我們的飛機購入項目被迫終止。並且，我們還要面對營收額大幅下降的問題。
這一局勢在下半年得到了逆轉，連續兩個季度營收超越80億美元。
今年將是我們崛起之年，我們的目標就是：成為亞洲第一的航空公司。”
收益2024年，由於開行了更多的航綫，黃色航空全年淨利潤較2023年增長1.4億美元，達到 5.76億美元，創下新高。我們的全年營業利潤亦達到 16.98億美元。
提高運力乘客運輸量突破歷史紀錄，超越2018年最高峰，全年累計載客 超過1.9億人次，進一步鞏固了黃色航空作為全球領先航空公司的地位。這一成就得益於我們積極擴展航線網絡、提升航班頻次以及優化服務體驗的努力。
2024年，黃色航空接待了1.9億以上人次，較上一年相比增加了2%。客座率上升到創紀錄的81.2%（去年同期：79.89%）。
總體而言，集團客運航空公司在 2024 年的調整後息稅前利潤為 10 億美元（去年同期：13 億美元）。客運航空公司營業利潤的下降主要是由於黃色航空的收益下降了9.48億歐元。新飛機的延遲交付迫使黃色航空公司將飛機的服役時間延長，再加上更多的選址和人員成本以及航班異常賠償費用的增加，對收益造成了不成比例的拖累。
貨運公司2024年為客戶們供運送了超過70萬噸的貨物，營收額約10億美元，超越去年同期（8.8億美元），較其他公司處於領先地位。
運營策略調整2024年，我們持續投資於提升乘客體驗，包括機隊現代化、數字化升級與環保計劃：

機隊擴展與更新：2024年，我們接收了39架新飛機，包括空中客車的A330-900neo, A350-900及1000; 波音的787-9, 10，龐巴迪CRJ-900，我們自己家的黃色飛機製造公司的Y463-500, Y462-200。
數字化升級：我們為太平川國際機場的黃色航空休息室增加了更多的智能交互系統，讓旅客更加舒適。
綠色航空發展：加大可持續航空燃料投資，致力於降低環境影響，為全球減排貢獻力量。

新品牌戰略黃色航空將於 2025 年推出新的主品牌戰略。其目的是讓客人更加切實地感受到集團的優勢。此外，各航空公司互動產生的協同效應將以綜合方式變得更加有用。如今，黃色航空約有一半的轉機乘客已經乘坐了不止一家集團航空公司的航班。他們受益於互補的航線網路、共用的地面基礎設施和世界領先的應用程式。在YELLOW AIRLINES主打品牌下，各個品牌之間的聯繫以及它們在航空公司集團中的互動方式在未來將變得更加透明和清晰可辨。
展望未來2025年，黃色航空將致力於擴大業務規模，提升運營效能，並實現成為亞洲領先航空公司的目標。我們計劃接收50架新飛機，增強運力，並提升燃油效率，預計全年載客量突破2.1億人次。在營收方面，隨著航線網絡的擴展與市場拓展，我們預期營收將增長15%以上，突破120億美元。我們將強化數字化轉型，提升顧客體驗，並繼續加大對綠色航空技術的投資，推動可持續發展。此外，黃色航空將推出全新的品牌戰略，提升集團內各航空公司的協同效應，增強品牌形象。總之，2025年將是黃色航空邁向卓越的重要一年，我們將持續創新、優化服務、加強協作，確保在全球航空市場中保持競爭力。作為其歷史上最大規模機隊現代化的一部分，黃色航空預計將在今年每兩周接收一架新的高效能飛機。總體而言，訂單清單包括約 350 架飛機，其中 200 架是長途飛機。機隊的更新和對高級產品的投資對客戶滿意度有直接影響。目前，已有 9 架空客 A350，12架Y463配備了我們的空恆商務艙，其中 7 架A350，5架Y463還配備了我們的新的水憶頭等艙。
我們深知，這一切成就離不開每一位旅客的支持與員工的辛勤付出。未來，黃色航空將繼續秉持創新、卓越與可持續發展的理念，與您共同翱翔天際，開創更加輝煌的篇章！
黃色航空 2025年3月 青城

黄色航空2025年展望尊敬的旅客、合作伙伴与全体员工：
过去一年，我们黄色航空凭借卓越的经营策略、优质的客户服务与强劲的市场需求，取得了历史性佳绩。在全球航空业恢复与增长的背景下，我们稳步推进业务发展，并交出了一份亮眼的成绩单。
2024年对黄色公司来说，极具挑战性。首先，在上半年，我们的赞助商突然与我们终止了合作，我们的飞机购买项目被迫终止。同时，我们还面临营收大幅下降的问题。
这一局势在下半年得到了逆转，连续两个季度营收超越80亿美元。
今年将是我们崛起之年，我们的目标是：成为亚洲第一的航空公司。
收益2024年，由于开设了更多的航线，黄色航空全年净利润较2023年增长1.4亿美元，达到 5.76亿美元，创下新高。我们的全年营业利润也达到 16.98亿美元。
提高运力乘客运输量突破历史纪录，超越2018年最高峰，全年累计载客 超过1.9亿人次，进一步巩固了黄色航空作为全球领先航空公司的地位。这一成就得益于我们积极扩展航线网络、提升航班频次以及优化服务体验的努力。
2024年，黄色航空接待了1.9亿以上人次，较上一年相比增加了2%。客座率上升到创纪录的81.2%（去年同期：79.89%）。
总体而言，集团客运航空公司在 2024 年的调整后息税前利润为 10 亿美元（去年同期：13 亿美元）。客运航空公司营业利润的下降主要是由于黄色航空的收益下降了9.48亿欧元。新飞机的延迟交付迫使黄色航空公司将飞机的服役时间延长，再加上更多的选址和人员成本以及航班异常赔偿费用的增加，对收益造成了不成比例的拖累。
货运公司2024年为客户们提供运送了超过70万吨的货物，营收额约10亿美元，超越去年同期（8.8亿美元），在其他公司中处于领先地位。
运营策略调整2024年，我们持续投资于提升乘客体验，包括机队现代化、数字化升级与环保计划：

机队扩展与更新：2024年，我们接收了39架新飞机，包括空中客车的A330-900neo, A350-900及1000；波音的787-9, 10，庞巴迪CRJ-900，我们自家公司的黄色飞机制造公司生产的Y463-500, Y462-200。
数字化升级：我们为太平川国际机场的黄色航空休息室增加了更多的智能交互系统，让旅客更加舒适。
绿色航空发展：加大可持续航空燃料投资，致力于降低环境影响，为全球减排贡献力量。

新品牌战略黄色航空将于 2025 年推出新的主品牌战略。其目的是让客人更加切实地感受到集团的优势。此外，各航空公司互动产生的协同效应将以综合方式变得更加有用。如今，黄色航空约有一半的转机乘客已经乘坐了不止一家集团航空公司的航班。他们受益于互补的航线网络、共享的地面基础设施和世界领先的应用程序。在YELLOW AIRLINES主打品牌下，各个品牌之间的联系以及它们在航空公司集团中的互动方式在未来将变得更加透明和清晰可辨。
展望未来2025年，黄色航空将致力于扩大业务规模，提升运营效能，并实现成为亚洲领先航空公司的目标。我们计划接收50架新飞机，增强运力，并提升燃油效率，预计全年载客量突破2.1亿人次。在营收方面，随着航线网络的扩展与市场拓展，我们预计营收将增长15%以上，突破120亿美元。我们将强化数字化转型，提升顾客体验，并继续加大对绿色航空技术的投资，推动可持续发展。此外，黄色航空将推出全新的品牌战略，提升集团内各航空公司的协同效应，增强品牌形象。总之，2025年将是黄色航空迈向卓越的重要一年，我们将持续创新、优化服务、加强协作，确保在全球航空市场中保持竞争力。作为其历史上最大规模机队现代化的一部分，黄色航空预计将今年每两周接收一架新的高性能飞机。总体而言，订单清单包括约350架飞机，其中200架是长途飞机。机队的更新和对高级产品的投资对客户满意度有直接影响。目前，已有9架空客A350，12架Y463配备了我们的空恒商务舱，其中7架A350，5架Y463还配备了我们的新的水忆头等舱。
我们深知，这一切成就离不开每一位旅客的支持与员工的辛勤付出。未来，黄色航空将继续秉持创新、卓越与可持续发展的理念，与您共同翱翔天际，开创更加辉煌的篇章！
黄色航空 2025年3月 青城

Yellow Airlines 2025 OutlookDear passengers, partners, and all employees,
In the past year, Yellow Airlines has achieved historic results with excellent business strategies, high-quality customer service, and strong market demand. In the context of global recovery and growth in the aviation industry, we have steadily advanced our business development and delivered outstanding results.
2024 has been challenging for Yellow Airlines. In the first half of the year, we faced the sudden termination of our sponsorship and were forced to halt our aircraft purchase program. We also encountered significant revenue declines.
However, this situation was reversed in the second half of the year, with revenue exceeding $8 billion in two consecutive quarters.
This year will be our rise to prominence, with our goal being: to become the number one airline in Asia.
RevenueIn 2024, due to the opening of more routes, Yellow Airlines achieved a net profit of $576 million, an increase of $140 million compared to 2023, setting a new record. Our annual operating profit also reached $1.698 billion.
Increasing CapacityPassenger transport volume broke historical records, surpassing the peak in 2018, with a total of over 190 million passengers in 2024, further consolidating Yellow Airlines as a global leading airline. This achievement was made possible through our proactive expansion of the route network, increased flight frequency, and optimized service experience.
In 2024, Yellow Airlines served over 190 million passengers, an increase of 2% compared to the previous year. The load factor rose to a record-breaking 81.2% (previous year: 79.89%).
Overall, the group’s passenger airline operations posted an adjusted EBITDA of $1 billion in 2024 (compared to $ 1. 3 billion in 2023). The decrease in operating profits was mainly due to a $948 million decline in Yellow Airlines’ revenues. The delayed delivery of new aircraft forced Yellow Airlines to extend their service times, adding more site and personnel costs, as well as increased compensation for flight disruptions, which disproportionately impacted profits.
The cargo company shipped over 700,000 tons of goods in 2024, generating revenue of about $1 billion, surpassing the previous year ($880 million), and maintaining a leading position compared to other companies.
Operational Strategy AdjustmentsIn 2024, we continued to invest in enhancing the passenger experience, including fleet modernization, digital upgrades, and green initiatives:

Fleet Expansion and Updates: In 2024, we received 39 new aircraft, including Airbus A330-900neo, A350-900 and A350-1000; Boeing 787-9, 787-10; Bombardier CRJ-900; and new Y463-500 and Y462-200 aircraft from our own Yellow Aircraft Manufacturing Company.
Digital Upgrades: We added more smart interaction systems to the Yellow Airlines lounge at Taipingchuan International Airport, providing passengers with greater comfort.
Green Aviation Development: We are increasing investments in sustainable aviation fuel to reduce environmental impact and contribute to global emissions reduction.

New Brand StrategyYellow Airlines will launch a new master brand strategy in 2025. The aim is to allow customers to feel the advantages of the group more tangibly. Additionally, the synergies generated by the interaction between the airlines will become more beneficial in an integrated way. Currently, about half of our connecting passengers have flown with more than one airline in the group, benefiting from complementary route networks, shared ground infrastructure, and world-leading applications. Under the YELLOW AIRLINES master brand, the connections between the individual brands and their interactions within the airline group will become clearer and more transparent in the future.
Looking to the FutureIn 2025, Yellow Airlines will focus on expanding business scale, improving operational efficiency, and achieving the goal of becoming the leading airline in Asia. We plan to receive 50 new aircraft to enhance capacity and improve fuel efficiency, with expected passenger volume surpassing 210 million. With the expansion of the route network and market reach, we expect revenue to grow by over 15%, exceeding $12 billion. We will strengthen digital transformation, enhance customer experience, and continue investing in green aviation technologies to promote sustainable development. In addition, Yellow Airlines will launch a new brand strategy to enhance the synergy within the group and strengthen our brand image. Overall, 2025 will be a pivotal year for Yellow Airlines as we strive for excellence. We will continue innovating, optimizing services, and enhancing collaboration to ensure our competitiveness in the global aviation market. As part of the largest fleet modernization in its history, Yellow Airlines expects to receive a new high-performance aircraft every two weeks this year. Overall, the order list includes about 350 aircraft, with 200 long-haul planes. The fleet upgrades and investments in premium products directly impact customer satisfaction. Currently, 9 Airbus A350s and 12 Y463s are equipped with our Kung Heng Business Class, and 7 A350s and 5 Y463s are also equipped with our new Shui Yik First Class.
We know that these achievements would not be possible without the support of every passenger and the hard work of our employees. In the future, Yellow Airlines will continue to uphold the principles of innovation, excellence, and sustainable development, and together with you, we will soar higher and create an even more brilliant future!
Yellow Airlines March 2025, Tsing Ceng

Yellow Incorporation - 公司新聞發布關於黃色集團黃色集團是一家多元化的全球集團公司，致力於塑造交通、科技和製造業的未來。我們秉持創新、安全和可持續發展的承諾，持續在多個行業取得突破。我們旗下擁有多家子公司，專注於航空、科技、鐵路和先進製造等領域。

2. MEC（Marcus Elam Corporation）MEC總部位於廣州南沙區GUIS，專注於開發和銷售前沿科技產品，包括手機、電腦等消費電子產品。我們致力於引領科技行業，通過提供高性能、高品質的產品，提升全球用戶的生活品質，讓所有人都能享受科技帶來的便捷與好處。
3. 黃色鐵路黃色鐵路總部位於青城市，下有青城地鐵，黃色高速鐵路，運營著廣泛的鐵路網絡，提供快速、高效、可持續的交通解決方案。其中，青城地鐵已經運營超過30條綫路，運營裡程超832.8公里，黃色高速鐵路提供了多條從青城市西昌站來往中國內地的線路，運營里程超1500公里。我們的服務旨在促進區域之間的人員、貨物和服務流動，支持經濟發展並改善人們的流動性。
4. 黃色飛機製造公司黃色飛機製造公司致力於設計和生產最先進的飛機。我們注重創新、安全和燃油效率，向航空行業提供商用、私人和貨運飛機，滿足日益增長的需求。我們目前生產了YAMC460，YAMC462，YAMC463系列的飛機，安全運營時數1,000,000小時。未來，會有更多型號的飛機加入我們的大家庭。
5. 黃色列車製造公司黃色列車製造公司專注於設計和生產高速、可持續的列車。我們的列車採用最新技術，提供舒適、快速、可靠的乘坐體驗，同時促進環保和可持續發展。我們為青城地鐵提供了超過600輛列車
我們的使命與願景在黃色集團，我們的使命是成為全球交通、科技和製造業的領導者。我們通過不斷推動創新的邊界，確保在所有領域的安全性和可持續性，創造一個更好的、更具互聯性的世界。通過我們的子公司，我們致力於提供優質的產品和服務，提升全球個人和企業的生活質量。
敬請關注我們在各個行業的持續發展和進步。

Yellow Incorporation - Company News ReleaseAbout Yellow IncorporationYellow Incorporation is a diversified global conglomerate committed to shaping the future of transportation, technology, and manufacturing industries. With a commitment to innovation, safety, and sustainability, we continue to make breakthroughs across various sectors. Our portfolio includes several subsidiaries focusing on aviation, technology, railways, and advanced manufacturing.
Our Subsidiaries1. Yellow AirlinesYellow Airlines is a leading airline company headquartered at Tsing Ceng Tai Ping Cheun International Airport. We pride ourselves on providing reliable service, a modern and advanced fleet, and exceptional customer satisfaction. Not only do we have a broad global network connecting major cities around the world, but we also offer flights to smaller airports, providing both passenger and cargo services to ensure convenience and excellence in air travel.
2. MEC (Marcus Elam Corporation)MEC, headquartered in the Nansha District of Guangzhou, focuses on developing and selling cutting-edge technology products, including mobile phones, computers, and other consumer electronics. We are committed to leading the tech industry by delivering high-performance and high-quality products that enhance the lives of users globally, allowing everyone to enjoy the convenience and benefits brought by technology.
3. Yellow RailwayYellow Railway is headquartered in Tsing Ceng City and operates a wide railway network, offering fast, efficient, and sustainable transportation solutions. This includes the Tsing Ceng Metro, with over 30 lines covering a total distance of more than 832.8 kilometers, and Yellow High-Speed Rail, providing multiple routes between Tsing Ceng City and mainland China, with a total operational distance of over 1500 kilometers. Our services aim to facilitate the movement of people, goods, and services between regions, supporting economic development and improving mobility.
4. Yellow Aircraft Manufacturing CompanyYellow Aircraft Manufacturing Company is dedicated to designing and producing the most advanced aircraft. We focus on innovation, safety, and fuel efficiency while providing commercial, private, and cargo aircraft to meet the growing demands of the aviation industry. Currently, we produce the YAMC460, YAMC462, and YAMC463 series aircraft, which have accumulated over 1,000,000 flight hours. More aircraft models will join our fleet in the future.
5. Yellow Train ManufacturingYellow Train Manufacturing specializes in the design and production of high-speed, sustainable trains. Our trains use the latest technology to offer comfortable, fast, and reliable rides while promoting environmental sustainability. We have provided over 600 trains for the Ting Ceng Metro.
Our Mission and VisionAt Yellow Incorporation, our mission is to become a global leader in transportation, technology, and manufacturing industries. We continuously push the boundaries of innovation, ensuring safety and sustainability in all our fields to create a better and more connected world. Through our subsidiaries, we are committed to providing high-quality products and services that improve the lives of individuals and businesses worldwide.
Stay tuned for more updates on our continued development and progress in various industries.

MarcBook Light Original - 最新進展MarcBook Light Original 的研發取得了一些新進展。我們已經成功完成了外殼設計與所有硬件組裝。外殼採用了輕量化設計，確保設備在便攜性的同時擁有出色的耐用性。此外，內部硬件已經完成整合，包括高效能處理器、高清顯示屏以及長續航電池。我們正在進行最終的測試與系統優化，確保 MarcBook Light Original 能夠為用戶帶來最佳的使用體驗。敬請期待更多更新！

MarcBook Light Original 的研发取得了一些新的进展。我们已经成功完成了外壳设计与所有硬件组装。外壳采用了轻量化设计，确保设备在便携性的同时拥有出色的耐用性。此外，内部硬件已经完成整合，包括高性能处理器、高清显示屏以及长续航电池。我们正在进行最终的测试与系统优化，确保 MarcBook Light Original 能够为用户带来最佳的使用体验。敬请期待更多更新！

The development of MarcBook Light Original has made some new progress. We have successfully completed the design of the casing and the assembly of all hardware components. The casing features a lightweight design that ensures both portability and durability. Additionally, the internal hardware has been fully integrated, including a high-performance processor, a high-resolution display, and a long-lasting battery. We are currently conducting final testing and system optimizations to ensure that the MarcBook Light Original delivers the best possible user experience. Stay tuned for more updates!
